boardgame.name: Panzer Blitz
PanzerBlitz
boardgame.description: A groundbreaking board game of armored warfare on the Eastern Front in World War II._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;The game is tactical scale (company/platoon sized units) with geomorphic map boards. The 352 counters are 5/8' and were very striking for their time. _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;250 meters per hex, 6 minutes per turn._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Avalon Hill Complexity Rating: 6._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;
boardgame.boardgamepodcastepisode: I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;ve Been Diced! episode 10: Gateway games
boardgame.boardgameexpansion: Tactical Combat in the Middle East: Part 1 – Battlefield Iraq

result.value: Some necessary text - easily memorized or small crib sheet
Moderate in-game text - needs crib sheet or paste ups
Extensive use of text - massive conversion needed to be playable

A complete game in very nice condition Pieces are punched but stored neatly in a clear plastic counter storage tray Minimal scuffing on game box

Avalon Hill Panzerblitz. Classic! Complete and in overall good condition. Bonus: I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;ll throw in the Avalon Hill General Issue about the game!
Note: I only use UPS for shipping.

Box: Good condition some rubbing on the corners, a little faded on side, one small split that has been taped to stop it getting worse, one corner has been fixed Map: 3 mounted map boards all in good condition Rules: rules of play pamphlet good condition, campaign analysis 24 pages good condition Charts: 1 quick reference combat/terrain chart good condition, 6 scenario cards each with 2 scenarios 1-12, examples of play card all in good condition Dice: 1D6 Counters: 352 punched and checked counters bagged all in good condition. There are two counters missing one german wreck and one panzer IV (there are another 13 and 11 respectively of in the counter mix), so this would have minimal impact on the game. I have however made up replacements for both counters that are full colour copies mounted on the same weight card. Weight: 1000g Also included a huge number of general articles on the game and a copy (scan) of the panzerblitz players guide.
Excellent condition, played once, counters punched and in zip-lock bags, box very nice.
Some wear on box. Includes all pieces and manual.

Wear and tear on box, primarily due to age and use. Box and box graphics still in relatively good condition. Missing two German units: 75 MM antitank gun and Tiger II tank counters. All other rules, maps and counters in excellent condition.
Good condition, with lots of extra articles

PanzerBlitz, Avalon Hill 1970. The game of armored warfare on the Eastern Front 1941-1945. The outer box is in good condition, while the inner content box is in excellent condition, and the contents are punched, but complete and in very good condition.
Punched. Some box damage. Name written on rulebooks. Complete.
Punched, complete and in very good condition
Punched. Complete. Box has taped corner. Components in very nice shape (except for the box)

CONDITION: Excellent condition, contents mint, unused and complete, with unpunched counters. The box has light-moderate shelfwear, but the contents are pristine. POSTAGE COST: UK postage: £5.50 European Postage: £9.00 Rest of World Postage: £17.50 Any buyers in and around London are welcome to collect in person (cash on collection). COMBINED SHIPPING: I will always combine multiple items to reduce your shipping costs where possible. Please note that it is NOT always cheaper to combine shipping on games outside the UK due to the weight limit of 2KG on the Small Packet service. As a rough approximation, outside the UK it is usually cheaper to combine 5 or more games, while 4 or less are best sent individually. This depends entirely on the specific games - please contact me before buying if you wish to purchase multiple games so that I can give you an accurate shipping cost. ABOUT ME: I have been playing and collecting games for over 25 years and I also sell games and magazines on ebay with the same username (saabdastard) where I have a 100% positive rating and a feedback score of over 4000. I am a verified PAYPAL Premier account holder (since 2004), with over 650 PayPal Verified Buyers. SELLERS TERMS AND CONDITIONS: PAYMENT TERMS: Please wait until you receive my invoice before sending payment. Payment is due within 5 days of the date you receive my invoice. Please do not purchase if you do not intend to pay, or cannot pay within this time frame. PAYMENT METHODS: UK buyers may use PayPal, cheque or cash-on-collection. Overseas buyers MUST USE PAYPAL only. SHIPPING: Buyer is responsible for all shipping costs. Europe and Rest of World rates shown above are for Airmail. Surface Mail rate to Rest of World is available if you wish (same as Europe Air rate), but Surface Mail to Rest of World can take up to 2 months! There is no real difference between Air and Surface rates for Europe. INSURANCE: Insurance is optional on all items, unless noted. Failure to take out optional insurance limits my liability for loss or damage in the mail to the amount automatically covered by Royal Mail (currently £39 per package for Small Packets, £150 for International Standard). CUSTOMS: Buyers outside the EU are responsible for all Customs charges applicable to their country. RETURNS: New Unopened items may be returned for a refund of the purchase price of the item, excluding shipping charges, within 7 days of the delivery date. All returned items must be in the original packaging and in the condition that they were shipped to you. Defective or damaged items can be returned for an exchange or refund within 7 days of the delivery date. All returns require authorization from me BEFORE returning the item.

This is the original slipcased edition. The outer slipcase has some wear, including small paper tears and paper bubbling, but is intact. The inner box has only very minor wear. The counters, scenario cards (all still attached except for one), and boards are in excellent condition. The rules and designer_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s notes/campaign analysis show signs of handling. ********** PANZERBLITZ********** AVALON HILL Games The game of armored warfare on the eastern front 1941 -45 - three map boards - one set of game rules - punched die cut counters - combat results tables - 12 situations effects cards - one example of play card - one campaign analysis book - one die All contents are intact and in good condition, box corners minimal scuff. Avalon Hill edition with the slipcase cover. Outer box has some shelf and edgewear but pretty crisp colors. Game materials are partially punched. Map boards are crips colored. Lightly played game. Game is in Acceptable shape.
Missing two counters: 1-JgdPz VI (of 1) 1-PzKpfw (of 13) Everything else is there and in good shape. Rulebook has a number of underlined sentences and is a bit _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;bent_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; (no creasing and essentially lays flat. It is perfectly readable. All other supplies are good including the mapboard, which are excellent. Box bottom has one split corner, top has no split corners but two tears of the paper on the bottom and top edges. Overall box is a bit sun faded and has shelf-wear, but no caving or creasing. This game is nearly perfectly playable except for the two missing counters, though I think proxies could easily be used. If this was a slipcase version there is no longer a slipcase. I am always open to trade or negotiate.

Extra Counters _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; Scenarios for Avalon Hill’s Panzerblitz Available is a new complete set of Avalon Hill Panzerblitz variant counters. These include the article, counters and scenarios in the General Vol. 28 #3; the article, counters and scenarios for Panzerblitz 1941, the article and scenarios for “The Forgotten Year” (1942) and Situations 14-25. These are new style counters, printed on cardboard, laminated with a protective plastic covering and hand cut. These are original-look counters. The graphics have been improved and enlarged so they are bold and crisp. The scenarios are printed on beige cardstock and look almost identical to the originals. Shipping will be $6.00 to Canada or $8.00 to the United States, by standard air mail letter. Expedited (4-day service,) tracked and insured is about $22.00 to the U.S., less to Canada. I will attempt to combine shipping on multiple orders whenever possible.
Payment by check or money order. Shipping $11.35.
Shipping Germany 5 Euro Shipping European Union 9 Euro Shipping World 15 Euro PayPal plus 2 Euro Money transfer via IBAN/BIC preferred

This is a player_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s copy sold as is. Punched, clipped, played. A couple of the mapboards have split into two pieces at the seam, but are otherwise fine and playable. In addition, there are about 150 or so spare counters included--they are mostly clipped. All other components accounted for.
